page.title: 20The Haunted House
page.content: One of the houses in the village of Bank, situated to the S.W. of Lyndhurst was thought to be haunted. One day the owner of the house was digging up the garden when she found some coins. She then saw a lady with grey hair running up the road and she had never seen her before. Just then she {vanished. }The owner told her family about what she had seen but nobody believed her. That night the grey haired lady ran through the owner's daughter's bedroom. The people in the house then left the grounds alone and a conifer stands over the place where the coins were found. {*********************************** {* This project was carried out by * { * third year pupils of * {* THE GREGG SCHOOL, SOUTHAMPTON * {***********************************
